talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Nothing comes for free. Where shall I ask you to go this time...?
(Rubinart grins)
<html>$He Has No Friends 2$</html>

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
Hmm... Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories this time!!
Make sure you do well like last time!
(Clear Corridor of Tangled Memories with at least A Rank in any difficulty level)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
Oh, you've done well this time too. Well done.
I wanted to tell you about Iona.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, he said he's a soul and that his jewel was somewhere else...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Let me check again. Are you sure that the Iona you met was a soul?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Indeed...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
He was no where to be found when I desperately looked for him... and he appeared in front of you as a soul... Iona... must have died.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
The last time I tried to look for Iona was when the Monolith was open. I didn't smell Iona anywhere and I couldn't feel his jewel around too. I don't know why, but he must have died before the Monolith was closed.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
No matter how much I think about it, I don't understand why. I know Iona was weak. His jewel was ridiculously small. But he had all the knowledge of Chaos Dragon and he knew all the magic spells. He was almost the only one around who saw the beginning of this world.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
How can such a person disappear in just a few months? It doesn't make any sense.
Besides, he was weak but he was strong enough to create a nest.
If he felt any threat... he would have made a nest immediately. But I never heard of such news.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
By the way, Iona's soul you met said... his memory was missing here and there, didn't he?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Creating a being made of soul is like making a copy of oneself. You insert memories until a certain time period and inject your strength.
But it would be extremely difficult to meddle with its memory.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
It would be downright impossible for a human or an elf to do it... or maybe not.
But the most likely culprit is Iona himself...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Of course I'm not talking about the culprit who killed Iona. I don't know about that. I'm talking about the culprit who fiddled with Iona's memory.
Maybe Iona thought such memories were dangerous and deleted them. I know he's clever enough to do such things.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I don't know why... He used to like telling me many things...
But if it's something he wanted to hide... Hmm, as his friend, I find it a pity.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Anyway, I told Iona over and over again to go out and make some friends but he didn't listen...
If he had friends, I could have asked them about him. People didn't even know there was a person called Iona living there.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I know it would have been hard for him. I just feel sorry about what happened.
Nothing can be done if you are stuck in one corner of the world. He lived for so long yet he didn't know that simple fact. Phew...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Ah, I don't know. What's the use of blaming him when he's no longer around. That idiot. Does he have any clue how long I waited to meet him again? That fool's a dragon for goodness sake, not an Elf or a human. He could have lived for as long as he wanted.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Anyway, this is your chance. Ask me anything if there's something you want to know.

${user_nick}$
Oh, there's something I'd been dying to know.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The meaning of my name. Why is it Rencraw?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What is it?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…(He turns away)
Well, sometimes you just feel like creating cool names...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That doesn't even sound like a lie.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Wh-what are you saying? Haven't you heard that I'm the most trustworthy dragon in the world?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sure you must have given it a meaning...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Hmph.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You want me to say it with my own mouth? No way. Just take it as it is and live on.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wow it's something so grand? That makes me feel like knowing the meaning even more...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Of course it's not something weird!! I thought about it for days with all the possibilities and paths. Your name is a dangerous one. It holds the possibilities of different future and it would only give you a headache when others find out about it...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>We can be similar in both ways.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Why! Why do you take after my undying curiosity!! Isn't taking after my handsome face enough for you?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Since I finally found out about my past, I wanted to know more about it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart pouts) Gee, I shouldn't have let you run away from home. Apart from making sure you knew how to make friends, I would have taught you manners so that you don't keep bothering the dragon that created you...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't even know if I'll still be alive after the next battle...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart looks flustered)
H-hey! Are you trying to induce sympathy to get me talking?! No way! That won't work on me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, it's the tough world that taught me.</html>
<html>Maybe Lunaria will get a shock when she sees me like this...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Seriously!!
Where did you learn such things? Did that damn fragment of Vestinel teach you that?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart covers his face)
Argh. Just don't make that weird face again when you hear about it, all right? And don't keep asking why I named you that way! Promise me and I'll tell you the meaning.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Your name may look like it doesn't mean anything... but it contains metaphorical meanings and implied implications too... If you break it down, you'll clearly see what it means... Well, if you're good with language that is...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wow that's such a good name!! A hope for someday...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Rencraw means... Hope, possibility, or a third way that may and will come true one day. It means an unexpected cause will create a consequence in a fortunate manner. Something like that.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It tickles me a little but I like it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart tries to act like he doesn't care about negative feedback)
So do you like it?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You used to hate it last time. You kept complaining that it didn't suit you, that it sounded like a curse, and said all the negative things about it. Right... That was when you showed your feelings for the first time. You were like disgusted... and angry at me... But I felt it was awkward to change your name so I just called you Ren from that day onwards.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well... I feel proud since you like that name.
Phew, I'm relieved that you grew up to be a good kid... Now I don't need to go through the trouble of teaching you those things. Anyway, keep the secret about your name. Don't go around telling people about it or it might create trouble.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I used to be such an asshole...)</html>
<html>(I didn't know he would be so happy…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
This is the first time... you thanked me for something... I find it a pity that the real me isn't here right now... I feel like meeting the real Rubinart and giving him this memory...(Rubinart turns around and sobs quietly)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why can't I call you my father!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:No}
…EEK!! Don't call me father!! I told you not to! Can't you just say thanks without the last word?!
It gives me creeps to hear a Beyond Dragon call me father!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(He hates it so much) All right...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Seriously, don't say that word! EVER!!
(Rubinart plugs his ears)
Never!! It freaks me out!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
No matter how I think about it, it's just not right to hear you call me father.
Anyway, I just want that term out of our relationship.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Okay, are there any more questions?

${user_nick}$
Yes!
Are all Chaos Dragons like you? How many are there in total?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hmm... Chaos Dragons... I guess you could be curious about that.
Who are the Chaos Dragons you've met so far?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Apart from Iona, you weren't close to the others?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
(Rubinart tilts his head)I thought many would have been awakened by now but I guess not. Even Bone Dragon isn't awakened yet... There are only about three I've met so I don't know exactly how many there are. Iona didn't talk about the other ones too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You have no feelings for your brothers and sisters...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, I could have a sensible conversation with Iona so we became good friends.
There's one more I met but that one's more like an enemy than a friend... Although I'm a Chaos Dragon too, there aren't many decent Chaos Dragons around.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Being corrupted is something you shouldn't take lightly.
They would basically want to destroy, or rule, or want to create chaos. Or they may be screwed in some other way.(Rubinart frowns like he thought of something painful)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I know it's more fun not to create chaos so I don't make trouble.
But there aren't many dragons who are smart enough to know that. There's no Chaos Dragon who's smarter than me so most of them probably don't know.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Among the dragons born out of Chaos Dragon's fragments you've met so far, did you see anyone who was worthy to be your friend?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That's because they have their own missions.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
See? Being able to build a relationship proves that I'm smart.
Even Argenta and Geraint who you like so much failed to blend into the human society.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hah... That mission again... Aren't you sick of it? That debate existed ever since Ancient Dragon and Chaos Dragon were alive. Of course, Chaos Dragon had his mission too, but he was much more flexible than Ancient Dragon.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
That's what Iona told me. Iona had Chaos Dragon's memories, remember?
Chaos was born later than Ancient. In human terms, they were like uncle and nephew although they look like they are only one or two years apart.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Maybe Ancient Dragon spent too much time alone. At first, Chaos Dragon found it hard to talk to him. He said he'd rather talk to a human than talk to Ancient Dragon. It looks like Ancient Dragon had no friends even when he existed for such a long time...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
And Chaos Dragon suffered from all the questions from Ancient Dragon like how I had to suffer when I raised the Beyond Dragon. Usually those who are born first know more things, isn't it? But that wasn't the case at all. One time, Chaos Dragon was so frustrated by all the questions that he ran away from Ancient Dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then was Chaos Dragon a good parent?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
After talking about that, I came up with a persuasive theory... The reason why Argenta and Geraint are assholes is because Ancient Dragon failed to pass them his knowledge. Besides, he wasn't that mild-tempered afterall... Yes! Parents are what's important! Though the Ancient wasn't exactly their parent...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Ah... Though Iona's personality doesn't define Chaos Dragon's personality,... I heard that...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Not the intelligence, what about the personality?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…he was very clever.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
He answered dozens of questions from Ancient Dragon each day. Don't you think he had patience too? Although I like answering questions too, the amount Ancient Dragon asked was enough to make you puke, according to what I heard from Iona.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(…What does that have to do with personality...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
And since I'm so handsome, I believe he was quite good-looking too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Throw anything you can lay your hands on)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Come to think of it, don't you have a temper too? This is all because of Ancient Dragon's foul temper and bad upbringin...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I have a temper don't I?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
AHHH!! See? You should make some friends and change your... AHH!! Don't pinch me!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…I'm just saying.
Oh by the way, I had something else to tell you about.
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Hmm... What was it...? It seemed like something important...
Talk to me in a bit.
(Talk to Rubinart after a while)

journal.title: He Has No Friends 1
journal.contents:
This time, Rubinart asked you to clear the Corridor of Tangled Memories.
Clear the dungeon with at least A Rank in any difficulty level.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.destination: Clear the Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.todo_msg: Clear the Corridor of Tangled Memories with A Rank or higher.

journal.title: He Has No Friends 2 2
journal.contents:
You have cleared with A Rank or higher. Go back to Rubinart.

Anu Arendel - Red Dragon Rubinart
journal.destination: Go back to Rubinart in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: You have successfully cleared the dungeon. Go back to Rubinart.
